item.title: Why another blog about virtualization?
item.description: 2019…time for another blog. Yes, I work for VMware. Therefore, there are many things that I try and test with our products. So far, I have written down all my experiences and ideas for myself, but I thought if it helps me, it will definitely help others. So I decided to start my own blog. Here it is. Welcome to vTANK!
